normalised: Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!

unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Get a Desi Twist!**
normalised: Spilling the chai on follower analytics! Forget just likes; knowing who is following you is the new cool. Especially crucial now, right before Onam, when every brand wants to tap into the South Indian market!

unnormalised: Spilling the chai on follower analytics! Forget just likes; knowing *who's* following you is the new cool. Especially crucial now, right before Onam, when every brand wants to tap into the South Indian market!
normalised: Think beyond the basic numbers, folks. New-gen tools can now pinpoint exactly where your followers are – are they all chilling in Chennai or is your content unexpectedly popping off in Kolkata? Even down to pincodes sometimes, unbelievable, right?

unnormalised: Think beyond the basic numbers, folks. New-gen tools can now pinpoint exactly *where* your followers are – are they all chilling in Chennai or is your content unexpectedly popping off in Kolkata? Even down to pincodes sometimes, unbelievable, right?
normalised: Also, figuring out their real interests is key. Do they double-tap for that yummy biryani recipe or just appreciate aesthetically pleasing travel vlogs of Kerala?

unnormalised: Also, figuring out their real interests is key. Do they double-tap for that yummy biryani recipe or just appreciate aesthetically pleasing travel vlogs of Kerala?
normalised: Mumbai-based startup, SocialSamosa Analytics, claims a twenty percent boost in engagement for clients using their granular follower insights. That's a significant jump, yaar!

unnormalised: Mumbai-based startup, SocialSamosa Analytics, claims a 20% boost in engagement for clients using their granular follower insights. That's a significant jump, yaar!
normalised: Even established platforms like I I T Bombay's Social Media Lab are working on algorithms to detect fake followers. Less focus on vanity metrics, more on genuine connection – that's the mantra!

unnormalised: Even established platforms like IIT Bombay's Social Media Lab are working on algorithms to detect fake followers. Less focus on vanity metrics, more on genuine connection – that's the mantra!
normalised: Basically, knowing your audience is like understanding your mom's secret spice mix for that perfect rasam. Essential for that next influencer marketing campaign, folks! Time to ditch the guesswork!

unnormalised: Basically, knowing your audience is like understanding your mom's secret spice mix for that perfect rasam. Essential for that next influencer marketing campaign, folks! Time to ditch the guesswork!
